#summary Acceptance criteria scenarios on User Story 8

*User Story*

As a contest manager<br/>
I want the system to provide me with a web interface<br/>
so that I can configure and run a tournament via it<br/>

 # The system must provide a web interface for configuring a tournament.
 # It should be accessible only for the contest managers, the contestants must not be able to load this page and execute any tournament.
 # The web interface must provide tools to select players out of all registered contestants.
 # It must provide tools to execute all different types of contests for the selected players.
 # The web interface must also allow configuration of the tournament settings.
 # The web interface must have a button for starting a tournament.
 # After starting the tournament and executing it, the web interface must display information of how it has finished.
